author: cnbc.com
title: Beth Sanders Named Senior Vice President of SUPPLY
text:
BOULDER, Colo., March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- SUPPLY, an award-winning media agency based in Boulder, Colorado, has named Beth Sanders to the position of Senior Vice President. Sanders is an agency veteran of LA and Boulder and brings deep expertise working with large-scale national brands. In this new role, Mrs. Sanders will lead SUPPLY's global initiative to grow client relationships and alliances across all client partnerships, foster internal employee growth, and drive innovation.
"We're thrilled to announce Beth's appointment to Senior Vice President. Beth's expertise and vast insight into all parts of our business are a great asset to our strategic planning team and provides our client partners a breadth of marketing knowledge and intelligence. Beth's commitment to excellence and driving results, while pushing the boundaries of what 'media' means in today's world, creates a culture built for growth as we continually evolve in the ever-changing landscape of media," said SUPPLY CEO Matt Nisbet.

SOURCE SUPPLY
